name: Blocky the Thief
description:
The Elder Blocks have been stolen, get your thiefy-tools and pack your stuff for the most dangerous journey of your life!

Steal, assassinate, find your way through doors, traps and enemies! Be stealthy, quick, deadly.

Overview:

Blocky the Thief is a 2D stealth game set in a crafted-with-hearth pixel style world. It has been created by a solo developer and features an unique gameplay: Blocky mechanics are opposed to the common arcade style. The player has to think about his next move, and gets awarded if he manages to clear the level without killing no one or getting noticed.

Each level is different than the other. There are traps, hiding spots, locked doors, riddles to solve, enemy spawns that gets triggered by alarmed guards and much much more!

You'll be surprised how Blocky can surprise you!

Game Features:
  • Stealthy actions in a colourful and bright pixel-style world
  • Different kind of enemies, each with unique abilities
  • Day / Night cycle, with a high impact on gameplay
  • Pickpocket gold and keys
  • Each level requires strategy!
  • first 2 worlds to explore!
  • Intense gameplay - traps, teleports, locked doors, riddles to solve and so on!
  • Chiptune/retro style music
Contribute!

Everything you see has been made by a single developer, it took a lot of time to create Blocky (and you're paying just a dollar for it!) so I would be grateful if you share it!

Blocky is in BETA version. I am constantly improving it thanks to your help, so don't be shy and send your feedback/bug reports (don't forget to add the steps on how reproduce a bug!) to michele.rullo90@gmail.com
